tuv.seg: Moving abroad from Ireland
Ag bogadh thar lear ó Éirinn
If you are planning to move abroad, you can prepare yourself in advance by getting as much information as possible about the country to which you are travelling
Má tá tú ar intinn bogadh thar lear, is féidir leat ullmhú roimh ré tríd an oiread eolais agus is féidir a fháil faoin tír atá mar cheann scríbe agat
You can search for this information online and also get information from your travel agent or the embassy of the relevant country
Is féidir leat an t-eolas seo a chuardach ar líne agus eolas a fháil ó do ghníomhaire taistil nó ambasáid na tíre ábhartha
You can use the library and, if possible, get in touch with people who have lived there previously
Is féidir leat an leabharlann a úsáid agus, más féidir, socrú a dhéanamh chun casadh le daoine a bhí ina gcónaí ann cheana féin
When you arrive at your destination, you may find that a lot of the attitudes and practices that you take for granted and consider "normal" are in fact peculiar to Irish culture

Nuair a shroicheann tu do cheann scríbe b’fhéidir go n-aimseoidh tú go bhfuil mórán dearcaidh agus cleachtais go nglactar leo gan smaoineamh agus go meastar a bheith "coitianta" atá aisteach do chultúr na hÉireann
It can take time to settle into a new way of life
Is féidir leis am a thógáil chun socrú isteach sa bhealach maireachtála nua
Whether you are planning to spend time travelling abroad or are moving to another country to work, our document on general tips for travelling abroad outlines what you need to do before you leave

Cibé go bhfuil tú ag pleanáil taisteal thar lear nó bogadh go tír eile le hobair a dhéanamh, déanann ár ndoiciméad ar leideanna ginearálta do thaisteal thar lear cur síos ar an méid atá le déanamh agat sula n-imíonn tú
For example, you should apply for an Irish passport if you don’t have one already
Mar shampla, ba chóir duit iarratas a dhéanamh ar phas Éireannach mura bhfuil ceann agat cheana féin
It is important to consider what the health issues are
Tá sé tábhachtach na saincheisteanna sláinte a thógáil san áireamh
If you are going to the European Economic Area (EEA) or Switzerland to travel or look for work you should get the European Health Insurance Card
Má tá tú ag dul chuig an Limistéar Eorpach Eacnamaíoch (LEE) nó chun na hEilvéise ag taisteal nó ag cuardach oibre, ba chóir duit Cárta Eorpach Árachas Sláinte a fháil
If you are travelling outside the EEA, you are strongly advised to seek specific holiday or health insurance before you travel and you should also check if you need to get vaccinations
Má tá tú ag taisteal lasmuigh den LEE, moltar go láidir duit árachas saoire nó sláinte ar leith a fháil roimh thaisteal agus ba chóir duit seiceáil an bhfuil vacsaíní ag teastáil
You can check whether you can use or exchange your Irish driving licence when you move abroad
Ba chóir duit seiceáil an bhféadfá do cheadúnas tiomána Éireannach a úsáid nó a mhalartú nuair a bhogann tú thar lear
Before you leave you should check our documents on useful documentation to bring and diplomatic supports for Irish people abroad
Roimh a fhágann tú, ba chóir na doiciméid atá againn a sheiceáil ar cáipéisíocht úsáideach le tabhairt leat agus tacaí taidhleoireachta d’Éireannaigh thar lear
Crosscare Migrant Project has published a leaflet, What to consider when emigrating (pdf)
D'fhoilsigh Crosscare Migrant Project bileog, What to consider when emigrating (pdf)

Whether you are planning to work within the European Union (EU) or work in a country outside the EU, you may find advertisements for jobs abroad in Irish and foreign newspapers as well as on job websites
Má tá Éire á fágáil agat chun obair a chuardach i dtír eile, d’fhéadfá a bheith ag pleanáil oibriú laistigh den Aontas Eorpach (AE) nó d’fhéadfá a bheith ag dul chun oibriú i dtír lasmuigh AE
It has information on a range of topics including residence formalities and travel
Aontas Eorpach: Is féidir leat fáil amach faoi obair agus scoir san AE ar europa.ie
If you are planning to work in the EU you should also check with your local employment services office or Intreo centre
Tá faisnéis faoi réimse topaicí, foirmiúlachtaí cónaitheachta agus taistil san áireamh, annMá tá tú ag pleanáil oibriú san AE, ba chóir duit seiceáil le d’oifig seirbhísí fostaíochta áitiúil freisin
Each office has a EURES noticeboard advertising vacancies from a range of European countries
Tá clár fógraí EURES ag gach oifig a fhógraíonn folúntais ó raon tíortha Eorpacha
If you are interested in working as a volunteer in another country there is information here about volunteering opportunities abroad
Má tá suim agat oibriú mar oibrí deonach i dtír eile, tá eolas ann faoi dheiseanna in obair dheonach thar lear

If you leave Ireland to live or work in another country or if you are returning to your own country having worked in Ireland you may be entitled to receive social security benefits in the country you are moving to

Má fhágann tú Éire chun cónaí nó oibriú i dtír eile nó má fhilleann tú ar do thír tar éis oibriú in Éirinn, d’fhéadfá a bheith i dteideal sochair slándála sóisialaí a fháil sa tír in bhfuil tú ag bogadh
You can find information about it in our document on social security arrangements between Ireland and other countries
Is féidir leat tuilleadh eolais a fháil faoin ábhar seo inár ndoiciméad socruithe slándála na hÉireann le tíortha eile
If you leave your employment to work as a volunteer development worker you may be entitled to credited social security contributions
Má fhágann tú d’fhostaíocht chun oibriú mar oibrí forbartha deonaí, d’fhéadfá a bheith i dteideal do ranníocaíochtaí creidiúnaithe slándála sóisialaí
